price: Kuwa hakika Mola wao Mlezi siku hiyo bila ya shaka atakuwa na khabari zao wote!
footnotes: Kwamba hakika Mlezi wao na Muumba wao bila ya shaka anajua vyema vitendo vyao na malipo yao Siku ya Kufufuliwa na Kulipwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
